mapper.update: update ums_role set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, role_name, description, create_time, status, sort from ums_role
